publicationStmt.p: published electronically as part of the TLS project at https://hxwd.org

sourceDesc.p: Created by members of the TLS project

sense.def: BUDDH: the Three Vehicles (from the Mahayāna standpoint this refers to the vehicles of the śrāvaka 聲聞, pratyekabuddha 緣覺, and bodhisattva 菩薩; the first two are often (derogatorily) referred to as 二乘 'the Two (minor) Vehicles'); SANSKRIT yānatraya, tri-yānika

tls:text.tls:line: "Wenn man nach den Gesetzen des Landes ginge,
"Gouverneur!"

sense.def: governor of a contextually determinate place N

tls:text.tls:line: "Sag an, wie kommt es, daß Gouverneur Li die Worte eines anderen lobt?

sense.def: governor of a contextually determinate place N

tls:text.tls:line: nur liebt er keine wählerische Wahl.lg==
Kaiser Taizong, durch seine kaiserliche Einsicht und Überzeugungskraft,
Du wirst glücklich und ohne Sorgen sein,
Lupo öffnete den Mund,

sense.def: want to, wish to (modal verb expressing volition)

tls:text.tls:line: Lupo blieb eine Weile stehen und dachte nach.

sense.def: poetic, CC: stand for a long time (in concentration or expectation)

tls:text.tls:line: Lupo blieb eine Weile stehen und dachte nach.
"Ehrwürden, wie kommt es, daß Ihr nichts zu sagen habt?"

sense.def: move forward, step forward, come forward

tls:text.tls:line: "Ehrwürden, wie kommt es, daß Ihr nichts zu sagen habt?"
einer war furchteinflössend und körperlich stark,

sense.def: BUDDH: No-mind (this is the most prominent Zen term, referring to the perfect, naturally pure mind 真心 (which is identical to fóxìng 佛性 Buddha-nature); the mind is in an original state of purity and does not engage in any discriminative thinking activities)
the cycle of death and rebirth
common person; commoner; ordinary person (as opposed to the saint)
The period of the sunrise (5-7 am)
the world of (beautiful) sounds/music and colourful things

respStmt.name: CH
respStmt.note: nab.adS would be useful, since the word in this meaning designates not a time as a grammatical subject but rather an abstract noun that functions as a "sentence adverbial", i.e. indicates when something was happening.

sense.def: To be crazy. A Chan word also seen in Zhuxi.
completely disorientated (like someone whose body has been turned round and round), utterly confused
BUDDH: the Six Perfections of a Bodhisattva (六波羅蜜); SANSKRIT pāramitā

tls:text.tls:line: Do not make up your own rules
calamity for the body
After it gets dilapidated more thatch will protect it

sense.def: Reed grass used for thatched roofs

tls:text.tls:line: How long before recovery from the three poisons of desolation?

sense.def: BUDDH: the Three Poisons (see also 煩惱, the three basic poisons are craving/desire/passion (rāga. tān 貪 or tānyù 貪欲), anger/hate/ill-will (chēn 嗔), and ignorance (moha, chī 痴 or yúchī 愚痴); the Three Poisons are also referred to as sānhǔo 三火 Three Fires, sāngòu 三垢 Three Impurities, sāngēn 三根 Three Roots, sānzhū 三株 Three Trunks, sān bùshàn gēn 三不善根)

tls:text.tls:line: The five skandhas, an empty aggregation, makes the man

sense.def: BUDDH: Five Aggregates (this the standard term for SANSKRIT pañca skandha; for an explanation of the term see 五陰)

tls:text.tls:line: <136> Hidden, manifest, ever roaming about in the five skandhas

sense.def: BUDDH: Five Aggregates (this the standard term for SANSKRIT pañca skandha; for an explanation of the term see 五陰)

tls:text.tls:line: Having received the precepts he journeyed to Nankang (Jiangxi) to see Dayi (Mazu)

sense.def: 【趙岐 on MENG 2B8 ？進退自由 待考】不自由 "unfreiwillig handeln"; act on one's own initiative; be one's own master; act on your own accord; be autonomous; be independent from others, not rely on others
autonomy; independence of spirit and mind
autonomy; independence of spirit and mind
【趙岐 on MENG 2B8 ？進退自由 待考】不自由 "unfreiwillig handeln"; act on one's own initiative; be one's own master; act on your own accord; be autonomous; be independent from others, not rely on others

seg.line: 但驗尋常行心於塵境自由不自由

tls:text.tls:srcline: 但驗尋常行心於塵境自由不自由

sense.def: autonomy; independence of spirit and mind

tls:text.tls:srcline: 但驗尋常行心於塵境自由不自由

sense.def: autonomy; independence of spirit and mind
autonomy; independence of spirit and mind

tls:text.tls:line: and the samādhi of the one practice.

sense.def: BUDDH: One-Practice samādhi (in LENGQIE SHIZI JI defined as 'fixing one's awareness on ultimate reality; related to the term yīxiàng 一相)
